name: Qiita Team Custom Notification
description: This is web application that filters Qiita:Team webhook by tag and notify to any slack channel.

SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Incoming Webhook URL on your slack team

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: slack channel name that is recipient of this custom notification

QIITA_TEAM_TAGS.description: filtering conditions(OR). This must be comma seperated values
